title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Remote Science Education Course Design for Managers Over 40

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of science and experience in administrative roles
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Apply fundamental research methodologies for scientific problem-solving in remote learning environments.
Collect/analyze scientific experiment data using smartphone-based tools and document findings in reports.
Complete a team project demonstrating scientific leadership competencies at the course conclusion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
